title: Identify this serif
content:
Seems to have transitional features like on the 'd' but I'll be darned if I can find a G with that high a waistline...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013043247/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_39.gif) | 4.55 KB |
author: Jon Whipple

comments.content: I believe it's Weiss with a modified G.

I think you're right about Weiss Marc. I think converting the G to outline and moving up the 'chin' serif points would give you this G. It also looks like maybe the Y has also been tweaked to make the vertical stem shorter.

- Mike Yanega
